TFT14_Item_Nitro_ChromeCounter.name: Chrome Counter
TFT14_Item_Nitro_ChromeCounter.description: Tracks Chrome for the Nitro trait. Every round, Nitro champions grant Chrome to R-080T based on their star level. At 200 Chrome, it upgrades to T-43X.

TFT_Item_BFSword.name: B.F. Sword
TFT_Item_BFSword.description: Basic component that grants Attack Damage.

TFT_Item_NeedlesslyLargeRod.name: Needlessly Large Rod
TFT_Item_NeedlesslyLargeRod.description: Basic component that grants Ability Power.

TFT_Item_NegatronCloak.name: Negatron Cloak
TFT_Item_NegatronCloak.description: Basic component that grants Magic Resist.

TFT_Item_RecurveBow.name: Recurve Bow
TFT_Item_RecurveBow.description: Basic component that grants Attack Speed.

TFT_Item_SparringGloves.name: Sparring Gloves
TFT_Item_SparringGloves.description: Basic component that grants Critical Strike Chance.

TFT_Item_FryingPan.name: Frying Pan
TFT_Item_FryingPan.description: Why else would it be here?

TFT_Item_AdaptiveHelm.name: Adaptive Helm
TFT_Item_AdaptiveHelm.description: Combat start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position. Front Two Rows: 40 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 1 Mana when struck by an attack. Back Two Rows: 15 Ability Power. Gain 10 Mana every 3 seconds.

TFT_Item_ArchangelsStaff.name: Archangel's Staff
TFT_Item_ArchangelsStaff.description: Combat start: Grant 30 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

TFT_Item_Bloodthirster.name: Bloodthirster
TFT_Item_Bloodthirster.description: Grant 20% Omnivamp. Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

TFT_Item_BlueBuff.name: Blue Buff
TFT_Item_BlueBuff.description: Gain 10 mana after casting. When the holder gets a takedown, they deal 5% more damage for 8 seconds.

TFT_Item_BrambleVest.name: Bramble Vest
TFT_Item_BrambleVest.description: Grants 7% max health. Take 8% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies (once every 2 seconds).

TFT_Item_Crownguard.name: Crownguard
TFT_Item_Crownguard.description: Combat start: Gain a 25% max Health Shield for 8 seconds. When the shield expires, gain 25 Ability Power.

TFT_Item_DragonsClaw.name: Dragon's Claw
TFT_Item_DragonsClaw.description: Gain 9% max health. Every 2 seconds, regenerate 2.5% maximum Health.

TFT_Item_ForceOfNature.name: Tactician's Crown
TFT_Item_ForceOfNature.description: Your team gains +1 max team size. 10% chance to drop 1 gold when you win combat.

TFT_Item_FrozenHeart.name: Protector's Vow
TFT_Item_FrozenHeart.description: Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds and 20 Armor and Magic Resist for the rest of combat.

TFT_Item_GargoyleStoneplate.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
TFT_Item_GargoyleStoneplate.description: Grants 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

TFT_Item_GuardianAngel.name: Edge of Night
TFT_Item_GuardianAngel.description: Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, gain 15% bonus Attack Speed.

TFT_Item_HextechGunblade.name: Hextech Gunblade
TFT_Item_HextechGunblade.description: Heal the lowest percent Health ally for 25% of damage dealt.

TFT_Item_InfinityEdge.name: Infinity Edge
TFT_Item_InfinityEdge.description: Abilities can critically strike. If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

TFT_Item_IonicSpark.name: Ionic Spark
TFT_Item_IonicSpark.description: 30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, they are also zapped for magic damage equal to 160% of their maximum Mana.

TFT_Item_JeweledGauntlet.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
TFT_Item_JeweledGauntlet.description: If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

TFT_Item_LastWhisper.name: Last Whisper
TFT_Item_LastWhisper.description: Any physical damage dealt 30% Sunders the target for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

TFT_Item_Leviathan.name: Nashor's Tooth
TFT_Item_Leviathan.description: After casting an Ability, gain 60% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

TFT_Item_MadredsBloodrazor.name: Giant Slayer
TFT_Item_MadredsBloodrazor.description: Deal 20% more damage to enemies with more than 1750 maximum Health.

TFT_Item_Morellonomicon.name: Morellonomicon
TFT_Item_Morellonomicon.description: Ability damage deals 1% Burn and 33% Wound to enemies for 10 seconds.

TFT_Item_NightHarvester.name: Steadfast Heart
TFT_Item_NightHarvester.description: Take 8% less damage. While above 50% Health, take 15% less damage, instead.

TFT_Item_PowerGauntlet.name: Guardbreaker
TFT_Item_PowerGauntlet.description: After damaging a shielded enemy, Abilities and attacks deal 15% more damage for 3 seconds.

TFT_Item_Quicksilver.name: Quicksilver
TFT_Item_Quicksilver.description: Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for 18 seconds. During this time, gain 3% Attack Speed every 2 seconds.

TFT_Item_RapidFireCannon.name: Red Buff
TFT_Item_RapidFireCannon.description: Deal 6% bonus damage. Attacks and Abilities 1% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

TFT_Item_RedBuff.name: Sunfire Cape
TFT_Item_RedBuff.description: Gain 8% max health. Every 2 seconds, an enemy within 2 hexes is 1% Burned and 33% Wounded for 10 seconds.

TFT_Item_RunaansHurricane.name: Runaan's Hurricane
TFT_Item_RunaansHurricane.description: Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 60% attack damage as physical damage.

TFT_Item_SpectralGauntlet.name: Evenshroud
TFT_Item_SpectralGauntlet.description: 30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 15 seconds of combat.

TFT_Item_StatikkShiv.name: Statikk Shiv
TFT_Item_StatikkShiv.description: Every 3rd attack unleashes chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 35 magic damage and 30% Shredding them for 5 seconds.

TFT_Item_SteraksGage.name: Sterak's Gage
TFT_Item_SteraksGage.description: Once per combat at 60% Health, gain 25% max Health and 35% Attack Damage.

TFT_Item_TacticiansRing.name: Tactician's Cape
TFT_Item_TacticiansRing.description: 10% chance to drop 1 gold after 10 seconds of combat.

TFT_Item_TacticiansScepter.name: Tactician's Shield
TFT_Item_TacticiansScepter.description: 10% chance to drop 1 gold when the holder dies.

TFT_Item_ThiefsGloves.name: Thief's Gloves
TFT_Item_ThiefsGloves.description: Each round: Equip 2 random items. Consumes 3 item slots.

TFT_Item_TitanicHydra.name: Titanic Hydra
TFT_Item_TitanicHydra.description: Attacks deal bonus damage based on the holder's maximum Health. Attacks cleave for a portion of the damage dealt.

TFT_Item_TitansResolve.name: Titan's Resolve
TFT_Item_TitansResolve.description: Grants 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times. At full stacks, grant 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

TFT_Item_UnstableConcoction.name: Hand Of Justice
TFT_Item_UnstableConcoction.description: Grant 2 effects: +15% Attack Damage and +15 Ability Power, 12% Omnivamp. While above 50% health, double the Attack Damage and Ability Power. While below 50% Health, double the Omnivamp.

TFT11_Item_ThiefsGlovesSupport.name: Thief's Gloves Support
TFT11_Item_ThiefsGlovesSupport.description: The holder gains 2 temporary items at the start of each round.

TFT_Item_AegisOfTheLegion.name: Aegis of the Legion
TFT_Item_AegisOfTheLegion.description: Combat start: Grant 25% Attack Speed and 15 Armor and Magic Resist to the holder, adjacent allies, and all allies behind them for 12 seconds.

TFT_Item_BansheesVeil.name: Banshee's Veil
TFT_Item_BansheesVeil.description: Combat Start: Grant the holder and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row immunity to crowd control and 25% Attack Speed for 18 seconds.

TFT_Item_Chalice.name: Chalice of Power
TFT_Item_Chalice.description: Combat start: Grant 25 Ability Power and 10 Mana to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

TFT_Item_SupportKnightsVow.name: Knight's Vow
TFT_Item_SupportKnightsVow.description: Combat start: Grant 200 Health and 15% Omnivamp to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

TFT_Item_EternalFlame.name: The Eternal Flame
TFT_Item_EternalFlame.description: While the holder is alive, all enemies are 33% Wounded and all allies deal 8% Damage Amp. This effect refreshes every 5 seconds.

TFT_Item_LocketOfTheIronSolari.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
TFT_Item_LocketOfTheIronSolari.description: Combat start: The holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a 250 Shield, 20 Armor, and 20 Magic Resist for 20 seconds.

TFT_Item_Moonstone.name: Moonstone Renewer
TFT_Item_Moonstone.description: Every 4 seconds, grant a 55-325 Shield (based on Stage) to the 2 lowest percent health allies for 4 seconds.

TFT_Item_NeedlesslyBigGem.name: Needlessly Big Gem
TFT_Item_NeedlesslyBigGem.description: Your team deals 5% bonus damage. Each second the holder is alive, your team deals an additional 1% bonus damage, up to a total of 20%.

TFT_Item_RadiantVirtue.name: Virtue of the Martyr
TFT_Item_RadiantVirtue.description: Every 5 seconds, heal your team for 7% of their max Health. When the holder dies, the healing increases to 14% max Health for 2 extra heals.

TFT_Item_Redemption.name: Redemption
TFT_Item_Redemption.description: Heal allies within 1 hex for 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 10% less damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

TFT_Item_SentinelSwarm.name: Sentinel Swarm
TFT_Item_SentinelSwarm.description: Grant a swarm of sentinels that protect allies.

TFT_Item_Shroud.name: Shroud of Stillness
TFT_Item_Shroud.description: Combat start: Shoot a beam that 30% Mana Reaves enemies. Your team gains 60 Health.

TFT_Item_Spite.name: Spite
TFT_Item_Spite.description: Combat start: The holder and all adjacent allies gain 15% Attack Damage and 20 Ability Power. When the holder dies, Stun all enemies within 2-hexes for 2 seconds.

TFT_Item_UnstableTreasureChest.name: Unstable Treasure Chest
TFT_Item_UnstableTreasureChest.description: When the holder dies, the 4 highest percent health allies gain a temporary completed item.

TFT_Item_ZekesHerald.name: Zeke's Herald
TFT_Item_ZekesHerald.description: Combat start: Grant 30% Attack Speed to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

TFT_Item_Zephyr.name: Zephyr
TFT_Item_Zephyr.description: Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds. Your team gains 2% Attack Speed.

TFT5_Item_ZzRotPortalSupport.name: Zz'Rot Portal
TFT5_Item_ZzRotPortalSupport.description: Summon a large Voidspawn. Its strength increases with each Stage. [Unique - only 1 per champion]

TFT4_Item_OrnnObsidianCleaver.name: Obsidian Cleaver
TFT4_Item_OrnnObsidianCleaver.description: Damage dealt 30% Shreds and 30% Sunders enemies for 15 seconds. Your team gains 8% Attack Damage and 8 Ability Power.

TFT4_Item_OrnnRanduinsSanctum.name: Randuin's Omen
TFT4_Item_OrnnRanduinsSanctum.description: Combat start: Grant 30 Armor and 30 Magic Resistance to the holder and adjacent allies.

TFT9_Item_OrnnPrototypeForge.name: Accomplice's Gloves
TFT9_Item_OrnnPrototypeForge.description: Copy equipped items from the ally directly to your left or right. These items work at 66% effectiveness.

TFT14_AnimaSquad_T1_Magic.name: Anima Squad Tier 1 Magic
TFT14_AnimaSquad_T1_Magic.description: Guiding Hex - Every 4 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion casts Guiding Hex, dealing magic damage to 3 random nearby targets.

TFT14_AnimaSquad_T1_Mines.name: Anima Squad Tier 1 Mines
TFT14_AnimaSquad_T1_Mines.description: Ani-Mines - Every 5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion throws three Ani-Mines that explode, dealing physical damage in an area.

TFT14_AnimaSquad_T1_SearingShortbow.name: Anima Squad Tier 1 Searing Shortbow
TFT14_AnimaSquad_T1_SearingShortbow.description: Searing Shortbow - Every 5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires Searing Shortbow, shooting an arrow that leaves an area that deals magic damage over time.

TFT14_AnimaSquad_T3_Laser.name: Anima Squad Tier 3 Laser
TFT14_AnimaSquad_T3_Laser.description: The Annihilator - A powerful laser weapon that deals massive damage.

TFT14_AnimaSquad_T3_Train.name: Anima Squad Tier 3 Train
TFT14_AnimaSquad_T3_Train.description: Final City Transit - Every few seconds, Final City Transit summons trains that run through the battlefield, dealing devastating damage and carrying away low health enemies.

TFT14_AnimaSquad_T3_YasuoQ.name: Anima Squad Tier 3 Yasuo Q
TFT14_AnimaSquad_T3_YasuoQ.description: Tornadoes - Every 6 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion spawns a whirl of Tornadoes, dealing magic damage.

TFT14_AnimaSquad_Weapon_Boomerang.name: Anima Squad Weapon Boomerang
TFT14_AnimaSquad_Weapon_Boomerang.description: Blade-o-rang - Every 4 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion throws a returning Blade-o-rang that deals physical damage, increased for the first target hit.

TFT14_AnimaSquad_Weapon_GatlingBunnyGuns.name: Anima Squad Weapon Gatling Bunny Guns
TFT14_AnimaSquad_Weapon_GatlingBunnyGuns.description: Gatling Bunny-Guns - Every 5.5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires Gatling Bunny-Guns in a long cone, dealing high physical damage.

TFT14_AnimaSquad_Weapon_SupplyDrop.name: Anima Squad Weapon Supply Drop
TFT14_AnimaSquad_Weapon_SupplyDrop.description: Surprise Supply Drop - A supply drop that provides resources or benefits to your team.

TFT14_AnimaSquad_Weapon_UwUBlasters.name: Anima Squad Weapon UwU Blasters
TFT14_AnimaSquad_Weapon_UwUBlasters.description: UwU Blasters - Every 4 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion rapidfires UwU Blasters, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit.

TFT14_AnimaSquad_Weapon_VortexGlove.name: Anima Squad Weapon Vortex Glove
TFT14_AnimaSquad_Weapon_VortexGlove.description: Vortex Glove - Every 5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires piercing orbs from Vortex Glove, that deal magic damage, reduced for each enemy struck.

TFT14_Item_DivinicorpEmblemItem.name: Divinicorp Emblem
TFT14_Item_DivinicorpEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Divinicorp trait.

TFT14_Item_StreetDemonEmblemItem.name: Street Demon Emblem
TFT14_Item_StreetDemonEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Street Demon trait.

TFT14_Item_DarkWebEmblemItem.name: Anima Squad Emblem
TFT14_Item_DarkWebEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Anima Squad trait.

TFT14_Item_CyberbossEmblemItem.name: Cyberboss Emblem
TFT14_Item_CyberbossEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Cyberboss trait.

TFT14_Item_EdgeRunnerEmblemItem.name: Exotech Emblem
TFT14_Item_EdgeRunnerEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Exotech trait.

TFT14_Item_ImmortalEmblemItem.name: Golden Ox Emblem
TFT14_Item_ImmortalEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Golden Ox trait.

TFT14_Item_BallistekEmblemItem.name: BoomBot Emblem
TFT14_Item_BallistekEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the BoomBot trait.

TFT14_Item_MobEmblemItem.name: Syndicate Emblem
TFT14_Item_MobEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Syndicate trait.

TFT14_Item_HotRodEmblemItem.name: Nitro Emblem
TFT14_Item_HotRodEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Nitro trait.

TFT14_Item_SuitsEmblemItem.name: Cypher Emblem
TFT14_Item_SuitsEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Cypher trait.

TFT14_Item_SuperchargeEmblemItem.name: A.M.P. Emblem
TFT14_Item_SuperchargeEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the A.M.P. trait.

TFT14_Item_GuardianEmblemItem.name: Vanguard Emblem
TFT14_Item_GuardianEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Vanguard trait.

TFT14_Item_StrongEmblemItem.name: Slayer Emblem
TFT14_Item_StrongEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Slayer trait.

TFT14_Item_CutterEmblemItem.name: Executioner Emblem
TFT14_Item_CutterEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Executioner trait.

TFT14_Item_ArmorcladEmblemItem.name: Bastion Emblem
TFT14_Item_ArmorcladEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Bastion trait.

TFT14_Item_SwiftEmblemItem.name: Rapidfire Emblem
TFT14_Item_SwiftEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Rapidfire trait.

TFT14_Item_ControllerEmblemItem.name: Strategist Emblem
TFT14_Item_ControllerEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Strategist trait.

TFT14_Item_BruiserEmblemItem.name: Bruiser Emblem
TFT14_Item_BruiserEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Bruiser trait.

TFT14_Item_MarksmanEmblemItem.name: Marksman Emblem
TFT14_Item_MarksmanEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Marksman trait.

TFT14_Item_TechieEmblemItem.name: Techie Emblem
TFT14_Item_TechieEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Techie trait.

TFT14_Item_ThirstyEmblemItem.name: Dynamo Emblem
TFT14_Item_ThirstyEmblemItem.description: The holder gains the Dynamo trait.

TFT4_Item_Artifact_InnervatingLocket.name: Innvervating Locket
TFT4_Item_Artifact_InnervatingLocket.description: The holder gains 2% of their total Mana on hit, each cast restores 20% of the holder's max Health over 3 seconds.

TFT4_Item_OrnnDeathsDefiance.name: Death's Defiance
TFT4_Item_OrnnDeathsDefiance.description: 50% of the damage the holder receives is instead dealt over 4 seconds as non-lethal damage.

TFT4_Item_OrnnMuramana.name: Manazane
TFT4_Item_OrnnMuramana.description: After casting the first time in combat, gain 120 Mana over 5 seconds.

TFT4_Item_OrnnTheCollector.name: Gold Collector
TFT4_Item_OrnnTheCollector.description: Attacks and Abilities execute enemies below 12% of their max Health. Executions have a 33% chance to drop 1 gold.

TFT4_Item_OrnnZhonyasParadox.name: Zhonya's Paradox
TFT4_Item_OrnnZhonyasParadox.description: Once per combat: At 40% Health, become invulnerable for 3 seconds.

TFT9_Item_OrnnDeathfireGrasp.name: Deathfire Grasp
TFT9_Item_OrnnDeathfireGrasp.description: Combat start: Blast the current target for 40% of their max Health as magic damage. Repeat this every 13 seconds. For the next 10 seconds, gain 25% Damage Amp. Against the blasted target this is increased to 35%.

TFT9_Item_OrnnHorizonFocus.name: Sniper's Focus
TFT9_Item_OrnnHorizonFocus.description: Gain +2 Attack Range. Gain 9% Damage Amp against a target for each hex between the holder and the target.

TFT9_Item_OrnnHullbreaker.name: Hullcrusher
TFT9_Item_OrnnHullbreaker.description: Combat start: If there are no adjacent allies, gain 600 Health, 20% Attack Damage, and 20 Ability Power.

TFT9_Item_OrnnTrickstersGlass.name: Trickster's Glass
TFT9_Item_OrnnTrickstersGlass.description: Summon a clone with 70% maximum Health and 10% increased max Mana. You cannot equip items to the clone. The clone benefits from active traits.

TFT_Item_Artifact_BlightingJewel.name: Blighting Jewel
TFT_Item_Artifact_BlightingJewel.description: Dealing magic damage reduces the target's Magic Resist by 4. If their Magic Resist is 0, grant the holder 5 Mana instead.

TFT_Item_Artifact_ProwlersClaw.name: Prowler's Claw
TFT_Item_Artifact_ProwlersClaw.description: After killing a target, shed negative effects and dash to the farthest target within 4 hexes. The next 2 critical attacks deal 60% bonus Critical Strike Damage.

TFT_Item_Artifact_RapidFirecannon.name: Rapid Firecannon
TFT_Item_Artifact_RapidFirecannon.description: Gain +1 Attack Range, increased by 1 whenever the holder kills an enemy.

TFT_Item_Artifact_TalismanOfAscension.name: Talisman of Ascension
TFT_Item_Artifact_TalismanOfAscension.description: After 22 seconds gain 100% max Health and 120% increased damage for the rest of combat.

TFT14_Item_WitsEnd.name: Wit's End
TFT14_Item_WitsEnd.description: Attacks deal 42-100 bonus magic damage. Heals the holder for 35% of all magic damage dealt. Damage increases based on Stage.

TFT_Item_Artifact_Fishbones.name: Fishbones
TFT_Item_Artifact_Fishbones.description: Doubles the holder's attack range, and causes each of their attacks to target a random enemy.

TFT_Item_Artifact_HorizonFocus.name: Horizon Focus
TFT_Item_Artifact_HorizonFocus.description: Stunning an enemy causes lightning to strike them, dealing 30% of their max Health as magic damage.

TFT_Item_Artifact_InnervatLocket.name: Innervating Locket
TFT_Item_Artifact_InnervatLocket.description: The holder gains 2% of their total Mana whenever they're hit by an attack. Each cast restores 20% of the holder's max Health over 3 seconds.

TFT_Item_Artifact_LichBane.name: Lich Bane
TFT_Item_Artifact_LichBane.description: The holder's first attack after each Ability cast deals 200-480 bonus magic damage. Damage increases based on Stage.

TFT_Item_Artifact_LightshieldCrest.name: Lightshield Crest
TFT_Item_Artifact_LightshieldCrest.description: Every 3 seconds, Shields the lowest percent Health ally for 55% of the holder's combined Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds. On death grants this shield to all allies.

TFT_Item_Artifact_LudensTempest.name: Luden's Tempest
TFT_Item_Artifact_LudensTempest.description: 100% of overkill damage plus 100 is dealt as magic damage to the three enemies nearest the target.

TFT_Item_Artifact_Mittens.name: Mittens
TFT_Item_Artifact_Mittens.description: Shrinks the holder, granting them increased movement speed and immunity to Chill.

TFT_Item_Artifact_SeekersArmguard.name: Seeker's Armguard
TFT_Item_Artifact_SeekersArmguard.description: Takedowns increase the holder's Armor, Magic Resist, and Ability Power by 15, increased to 20 if they score the kill.

TFT_Item_Artifact_SilvermereDawn.name: Silvermere Dawn
TFT_Item_Artifact_SilvermereDawn.description: Grants immunity to Stuns and the holder's attacks Stun the target for 0.8 seconds. The holder's Attack Speed is locked at 0.5.

TFT_Item_Artifact_SpectralCutlass.name: Spectral Cutlass
TFT_Item_Artifact_SpectralCutlass.description: Combat start: Teleport the holder to the mirrored hex on the enemy's side of the board. After 8 seconds, the holder returns to their original location.

TFT_Item_Artifact_SuspiciousTrenchCoat.name: Suspicious Trench Coat
TFT_Item_Artifact_SuspiciousTrenchCoat.description: Once per combat at 60% Health, the holder splits into 3 copies of themselves each with 33% of their max Health.

TFT_Item_Artifact_UnendingDespair.name: Unending Despair
TFT_Item_Artifact_UnendingDespair.description: Whenever a Shield on the holder breaks, 150% of that Shield's initial value is dealt to the nearest enemy as magic damage.

TFT14_ZeriCyberneticItem.name: Flux Capacitor
TFT14_ZeriCyberneticItem.description: Attacks store charge. At 4 charges, the next attack consumes the charges to deal 15% of the target's max health as physical damage and reduces their Armor by 10.

TFT14_ZeriCyberneticItem_Radiant.name: Fully-Charged Flux Capacitor
TFT14_ZeriCyberneticItem_Radiant.description: Every other attack is charged, dealing 20% of the target's max health as physical damage and reduces their Armor by 15.

TFT14_NaafiriCyberneticItem.name: Hyper Fangs
TFT14_NaafiriCyberneticItem.description: When you damage an enemy, store 30% of your damage dealt to them. After 4 seconds, deal the stored damage to the target and the nearest enemy as physical damage.

TFT14_NaafiriCyberneticItem_Radiant.name: Apex-Fangs
TFT14_NaafiriCyberneticItem_Radiant.description: When you damage an enemy, store 40% of your damage dealt to them. After 3 seconds, deal the stored damage to the target and the 2 nearest enemies as physical damage.

TFT14_VarusCyberneticItem.name: Holobow
TFT14_VarusCyberneticItem.description: Attacks that Critically Strike grant 2 bonus Mana. After casting an Ability, gain 40% Critical Strike Chance for 5 seconds.

TFT14_VarusCyberneticItem_Radiant.name: Holobow
TFT14_VarusCyberneticItem_Radiant.description: Attacks that Critically Strike grant 2 bonus Mana. After casting an Ability, gain 40% Critical Strike Chance for 5 seconds.

TFT14_JhinCyberneticItem.name: Pulse Silencer
TFT14_JhinCyberneticItem.description: Execute enemies below 12% Health. Abilities can critically strike. If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

TFT14_JhinCyberneticItem_Radiant.name: Pulse Silencer
TFT14_JhinCyberneticItem_Radiant.description: Execute enemies below 15% Health. Abilities can critically strike. If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 20% Critical Strike Damage instead.

TFT14_SejuaniCyberneticItem.name: Repulsor Lantern
TFT14_SejuaniCyberneticItem.description: Gain 5% health. Every 3 seconds, deal 6% of the holder's max health as magic damage to all enemies within 1-hex.

TFT14_JaxCyberneticItem.name: Repulsor Lantern
TFT14_JaxCyberneticItem.description: Gain 5% health. Every 3 seconds, deal 6% of the holder's max health as magic damage to all enemies within 1-hex.

TFT14_JaxCyberneticItem_Radiant.name: Nullifier Lantern
TFT14_JaxCyberneticItem_Radiant.description: Gain 10% health. Every 2 seconds, deal 10% of the holder's max health as magic damage to all enemies within 2-hexes.

TFT14_MordekaiserCyberneticItem.name: Corrupted Chassis
TFT14_MordekaiserCyberneticItem.description: All Shields are 15% more effective on the holder. Every 7 seconds, siphon 10% of the owner's max Health from the current target and convert it to a Shield for 5 seconds.

TFT14_MordekaiserCyberneticItem_Radiant.name: Harmonized Chassis
TFT14_MordekaiserCyberneticItem_Radiant.description: All Shields are 25% more effective on the holder. Every 5 seconds, siphon 15% of the owner's max Health from the current target and convert it to a Shield for 5 seconds.

TFT14_CybercoilItem.name: Cybercoil
TFT14_CybercoilItem.description: Abilities and Attacks mark enemies for 8 seconds. Heal for 12% of damage dealt to marked enemies.

TFT14_HolobowItem.name: Holobow
TFT14_HolobowItem.description: Attacks that Critically Strike grant 2 bonus Mana. After casting an Ability, gain 40% Critical Strike Chance for 5 seconds.

TFT5_Item_AdaptiveHelmRadiant.name: Jak'sho the Protean
TFT5_Item_AdaptiveHelmRadiant.description: Combat Start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position. Front Two Rows: 60 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 2 Mana when struck by an attack. Back Two Rows: 40 Ability Power. Gain 20 Mana every 3 seconds.

TFT5_Item_ArchangelsStaffRadiant.name: Urf-Angel's Staff
TFT5_Item_ArchangelsStaffRadiant.description: Combat start: Gain 40 Ability Power every 4 seconds in combat.

TFT5_Item_BloodthirsterRadiant.name: Blessed Bloodthirster
TFT5_Item_BloodthirsterRadiant.description: Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 40% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

TFT5_Item_BlueBuffRadiant.name: Blue Blessing
TFT5_Item_BlueBuffRadiant.description: Gain 10 mana after casting. When the holder gets a takedown, they deal 20% more damage for 12 seconds.

TFT5_Item_BrambleVestRadiant.name: Rosethorn Vest
TFT5_Item_BrambleVestRadiant.description: Gain 15% max health. Take 25% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by an attack, deal 175 magic damage to all adjacent enemies (2s cooldown).

TFT5_Item_CrownguardRadiant.name: Royal Crownshield
TFT5_Item_CrownguardRadiant.description: Combat start: Gain a 50% max health Shield for 8 seconds. When the shield expires, gain 50 Ability Power.

TFT5_Item_DragonsClawRadiant.name: Dragon's Will
TFT5_Item_DragonsClawRadiant.description: Gain 15% max health. Every 2 seconds, regenerate 10% max Health.

TFT5_Item_FrozenHeartRadiant.name: Bulwark's Oath
TFT5_Item_FrozenHeartRadiant.description: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 50% max Health shield that lasts 10 seconds and gain 60 Armor and Magic Resist.

TFT5_Item_GargoyleStoneplateRadiant.name: Dvarapala Stoneplate
TFT5_Item_GargoyleStoneplateRadiant.description: Gain 15 Armor and 15 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder. Also, heal 1.5% max Health each second.

TFT5_Item_GiantSlayerRadiant.name: Demonslayer
TFT5_Item_GiantSlayerRadiant.description: Gain 30% Damage Amp against enemies with more than 1750 max Health.

TFT5_Item_GuardianAngelRadiant.name: Brink of Dawn
TFT5_Item_GuardianAngelRadiant.description: Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, heal 100% missing health and gain 85% bonus Attack Speed.

TFT5_Item_HandOfJusticeRadiant.name: Fist of Fairness
TFT5_Item_HandOfJusticeRadiant.description: Gain 2 effects: 50% Attack Damage and 50 Ability Power, 30% Omnivamp. While above 50% health, double the Attack Damage and Ability Power. While below 50% Health, double the Omnivamp.

TFT5_Item_HextechGunbladeRadiant.name: Hextech Lifeblade
TFT5_Item_HextechGunbladeRadiant.description: Heal the lowest percent Health ally for 40% of damage dealt.

TFT5_Item_InfinityEdgeRadiant.name: Zenith Edge
TFT5_Item_InfinityEdgeRadiant.description: Ability can critically strike. If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

TFT5_Item_IonicSparkRadiant.name: Covalent Spark
TFT5_Item_IonicSparkRadiant.description: 30% Shred enemies within 3 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 200% of the Mana spent. Also, heal 1.5% max Health per second.

TFT5_Item_JeweledGauntletRadiant.name: Glamorous Gauntlet
TFT5_Item_JeweledGauntletRadiant.description: Ability can critically strike. If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

TFT5_Item_LastWhisperRadiant.name: Eternal Whisper
TFT5_Item_LastWhisperRadiant.description: Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for the rest of combat. This effect does not stack.

TFT5_Item_LeviathanRadiant.name: The Baron's Gift
TFT5_Item_LeviathanRadiant.description: After casting an Ability, gain 120% Attack Speed for 8 seconds.

TFT5_Item_MorellonomiconRadiant.name: More More-ellonomicon
TFT5_Item_MorellonomiconRadiant.description: Attacks and Abilities deal 2% Burn and 33% Wound to enemies for 8 seconds.

TFT5_Item_NightHarvesterRadiant.name: Legacy of the Colossus
TFT5_Item_NightHarvesterRadiant.description: Gain 16% Durability. While above 40% Health, instead gain 30% Durability.

TFT5_Item_QuicksilverRadiant.name: Quickestsilver
TFT5_Item_QuicksilverRadiant.description: Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for 45 seconds. For 18 seconds, gain 7% Attack Speed every 2 seconds.

TFT5_Item_RapidFirecannonRadiant.name: Crest of Cinders
TFT5_Item_RapidFirecannonRadiant.description: Attacks and Abilities 2% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

TFT5_Item_RedemptionRadiant.name: Absolution
TFT5_Item_RedemptionRadiant.description: Heal allies within 2 hexes for 25% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also gain 10% Durability for 5 seconds (this does not stack).

TFT5_Item_RunaansHurricaneRadiant.name: Runaan's Tempest
TFT5_Item_RunaansHurricaneRadiant.description: Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage as physical damage.

TFT5_Item_SpectralGauntletRadiant.name: Equinox
TFT5_Item_SpectralGauntletRadiant.description: 30% Sunder enemies within 3 hexes. Grant 70 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 20 seconds of combat.

TFT5_Item_StatikkShivRadiant.name: Statikk's Favor
TFT5_Item_StatikkShivRadiant.description: Every 3rd attack deals 95 magic damage and 30% Shreds 8 enemies for 5 seconds.

TFT5_Item_SteraksGageRadiant.name: Sterak's Megashield
TFT5_Item_SteraksGageRadiant.description: Once per combat at 60% Health, gain 40% max Health and 60% Attack Damage.

TFT5_Item_SunfireCapeRadiant.name: Sunlight Cape
TFT5_Item_SunfireCapeRadiant.description: Every 1.5 seconds, deal 2% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 3 hexes for 30 seconds.

TFT5_Item_ThiefsGlovesRadiant.name: Rascal's Gloves
TFT5_Item_ThiefsGlovesRadiant.description: Each round: Equip 2 random Radiant items. [Consumes 3 item slots]

TFT5_Item_TitansResolveRadiant.name: Titan's Vow
TFT5_Item_TitansResolveRadiant.description: Grant 3% Attack Damage 3 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times. At full stacks, gain 50 Armor and Magic Resist.

TFT5_Item_TrapClawRadiant.name: Willbreaker
TFT5_Item_TrapClawRadiant.description: After damaging a Shield, gain 30% Damage Amp for 3 seconds.

TFT5_Item_WarmogsArmorRadiant.name: Warmog's Pride
TFT5_Item_WarmogsArmorRadiant.description: Gain 20% max health. Heal 1.5% max Health per second.

TFT5_Item_ZzRotPortalRadiant.name: Zz'Rot Portal
TFT5_Item_ZzRotPortalRadiant.description: Summon a large Voidspawn. Its strength increases with each Stage. [Unique - only 1 per champion]

TFT7_Item_ShimmerscaleGamblersBlade.name: Gambler's Blade
TFT7_Item_ShimmerscaleGamblersBlade.description: Gain 1% bonus Attack Speed per gold in your bank (up to 80 gold). Each attack has a 5% chance to drop 1 gold.

TFT7_Item_ShimmerscaleMogulsMail.name: Mogul's Mail
TFT7_Item_ShimmerscaleMogulsMail.description: Grants 1 Armor, 1 Magic Resist, and 7 Health when taking damage, stacking up to 35 times. At full stacks, grant 1 gold and continue gaining 1 gold every 8 seconds.

TFT7_Item_ShimmerscaleHeartOfGold.name: Needlessly Big Gem
TFT7_Item_ShimmerscaleHeartOfGold.description: If the holder is alive after 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 1% more damage (maximum 1 gold) per gold you have. For every 2 units alive when this happens, gain 1 gold.
